Parameter.Title: Configuring Alarm Duration Time
Parameter.Description: This configuration parameter that can be used to adjust the time for beep and LED turned on when water leakage is detected. If this parameter is set to '0', the beep and LED will be turn on always until water leakage is not detected. Available Settings: 0-255min.

Parameter.Title: Configure Alarm Interval
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines beep on/off interval time when water leakage is detected. Available Settings: 1-255min.

Parameter.Title: Configure First Alarm On Time Duration
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines beep on duration first time when water leakage is detected. Available Settings: 1-255s

Parameter.Title: Configure Alarm on Time Duration
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines beep on duration after first beep on when water leakage is detected. Available Settings: 5-255s

Parameter.Title: Configure Alarm Enable/Disable
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines beep on is enabled or disabled when water leakage is detected. Available Settings: 0,1 '0' indicate beep on is disable, but LED will be turned on when water leakage detected. '1' indicate beep on is enabled, the BEEP and LED will be turned on when water leakage detected.

Parameter.Title: Configure Water Leakage Detected Enable/Disable
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines the function than water leakage detect is enabled or disabled. Available Settings: 0,1 '0' indicate disable water leakage detect. '1' indicate enable water leakage detect.

Parameter.Title: Basic Set Level
Parameter.Description: Basic Set Command will be sent where contains a value when the door/window is opened or closed, the receiver will take it for consideration; for instance, if a lamp module is received the Basic Set Command of which value is decisive as to how bright of dim level of lamp module shall be. Available Settings: 0-99,255
